title: Portfolio Template
description: A minimal portfolio template to showcase your work and experience
author: dillionverma

body.raw: ### What is this? A complete template to market yourself and your portfolio to the world as a developer ### Why should I use this? - ✅ Save 100+ hours of work - ✅ No need to learn advanced animations - ✅ Easy to configure and change - ✅ 1-click download and setup. - ✅ 5 minutes to update the text and images. - ✅ Deploy live to vercel ### Features - Hero Section - About Section - Work Section - Education Section - Projects Section - Hackathon Section - Contact Section - Blog ### Tech Stack
